title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When the view is resized smaller, the close button and another tool item move down to a new line.
EB: These two tool items should stay on the same line as the label, regardless of the view size. It is expected that the close button is located to the far right corner on the same line as the label.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Resize the view smaller.
3. Observe the position of the close button and the tool item.
